subject: Re: How do I make Unit Testing practical?
msgSnippet: ... have ... Good response Jeff.  It really is a matter of Just Do It! ... Thanks for the plug.  The final title is Test-driven Development: A Practical
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff Nielsen" <jeff.nielsen@d...>
wrote:
> For the last two years we have been writing "real applications" that
have
> unit tests for every method.

Good response Jeff. It really is a matter of "Just Do It!"

> A book you should watch for is Dave Astel's soon-to-be-published "A
> Practical Guide to Test-Driven Development".

Thanks for the plug. The final title is "Test-driven Development: A
Practical Guide", and it's *in production*. Hopefully, it'll be on
shelves in July. You can pre-order it from Amazon now.

Dave

Oh.. BTW... we offer training & mentoring on TDD :-)

www.adaptionsoft.com
